jobs.title: Senior Java Developer
jobs.description:
A cutting edge AI FinTech firm are looking for a well versed Senior Java Developer in Java 8. 

Candidates should have  
- 7+ years of experience with Java 
- 3+ years of microservices  
- A great understanding of REST & APIs - 3 years + 
- Extensive experience working on Agile  
- Cloud AWS or PCF exposure  
- CI/CD experience  
- A good background in BDD & TDD 

Essential skills in  
- Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud 
- JPA, Hibernate 
- Gradle, Jenskins, Cucumber  

Desirable skills in 
- Docker, Kubernetes, PCF 
- Kafka or similar

A cutting edge AI FinTech firm are looking for a well versed Senior Java Developer in Java 8.

Candidates should have

  • 7+ years of experience with Java
  • 3+ years of microservices
  • A great understanding of REST & APIs - 3 years +
  • Extensive experience working on Agile
  • Cloud AWS or PCF exposure
  • CI/CD experience
  • A good background in BDD & TDD

Essential skills in

  • Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud
  • JPA, Hibernate
  • Gradle, Jenskins, Cucumber

Desirable skills in

  • Docker, Kubernetes, PCF
  • Kafka or similar
